name: The Way To The Toilet
description:
Sometimes even just going to the bathroom is like hell!

Just follow the path and you'll eventually reach the toilet. But that's only if you're still alive!

You can beat up anyone who gets in your way, just press A to punch them!

Controls

  • Xbox-like gamepad are supported. A for punch, B for jump.Buttons can be changed in the menu.
  • On the keyboard, WASD is for direction, N for punch, M for jump, and Enter for start & pause. Buttons can be changed in the menu.
  • On mobile, use the buttons on the screen. 

Music 

seadenden : http://seadenden-8bit.com/
